Pioli Akan Berusaha Buat AC Milan Jadi Lebih Seimbang
05 Nov 2019, 22:23 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Pelatih AC Milan Stefano Pioli mengatakan ia akan berusaha untuk berusaha agar Rossoneri memiliki keseimbangan yang pas antara menyerang dengan bertahan.
Hal itu berkaca dari penampilan timnya saat melawan Lazio di San Siro awal pekan ini. Saat itu Milan kalah dengan skor 1-2.
Di laga itu Lazio bisa mencetak gol lebih dahulu melalui Ciro Immobile. Namun Milan bisa menyamakan kedudukan via bunuh diri Bastos.
Milan sebenarnya punya cukup banyak peluang mencetak gol, khususnya di babak pertama. Namun mereka tak bisa memaksimalkan peluang yang didapatnya.
Justru mereka akhirnya kebobolan via serangan balik di babak kedua. Joaquin Correa pun akhirnya bisa mencetak gol kemenangan bagi Lazio.

Pioli Will Try To Make AC Milan More Balanced
05 Nov 2019, 22:23 by Bola.net
AC Milan coach Stefano Pioli says he will try to make the Rossoneri have the right balance between attacking and defending.
This is reflected in the appearance of his team against Lazio at the San Siro earlier this week. At that time Milan lost 1-2.
In that match Lazio could score first goal through Ciro Immobile. But Milan can equalize via Bastos suicide.
Milan actually have enough chances to score, especially in the first half. But they cannot maximize the opportunities they get.
Instead they finally conceded via a counterattack in the second round. Joaquin Correa was finally able to score the winning goal for Lazio.
